name: Ggpo
tagline: ggpo command line client in python
body:
ggpo ==== ©2014 Pau Oliva Fora ([@pof](https://twitter.com/pof)) This is an alternative [GGPO](http://ggpo.net/) command line client written in python. I have only tested this on Linux but it might work on other platforms. You'll still need the ggpofba.exe from the original GGPO, which will be launched through wine. ## Installation Extract the original GGPO in ```/opt/ggpo```, and add ggpo.py and ggpofba.sh in the same folder. Edit ggpo.py to set your username and password. ## Usage 
$ /opt/ggpo/ggpo.py
ggpo> /help
-!- available commands:
-!- /challenge 	send a challenge request to 
-!- /cancel    	cancel an ongoing challenge request to 
-!- /accept    	accept a challenge request initiated by 
-!- /decline   	decline a challenge request initiated by 
-!- /watch     	watch the game that  is currently playing
-!- /join   	join the chat/game room 
-!- /list 		list all available channels or chat/game rooms
-!- /users 		list all users in the current channel
-!- /intro 		view the channel welcome text
-!- /away 		set away status (you can't be challenged)
-!- /back 		set available status (you can be challenged)
-!- /clear 		clear the screen
-!- /quit 		quit ggpo
